data.title: ★ John Major Address
data.meta_description: Provides a mailing address for requesting autographs and sending fan mail to John Major
data.text:
How to send your fan mail and autograph requests to John Major?:

If you want to request an autograph, follow the guidelines bellow. If you just want to mail a letter with the address above, and do not want anything back, then you can stop reading! If you live in UK send a properly stamped and self addressed envelope (minimum size 8.5" x 4") with your request letter and a photo. You can include a piece of cardboard to keep the photo from bending in shipping and also add "Do Not Bend" on the envelopes. Send your letter and wait. On average, there is going to be a 3+ month wait for a response. If you do not live in UK, you can purchase your british stamps here *For information on postage prices to receive a letter from UK click here.

Feedback received:

Sir John Major Success - July 6th, 2019

Sent 2 x 6x4 to Sir John, and received them today back signed. I used the address below. The Office of Sir John Major P.O. Box 38506 London SW1P 1ZW Photo available here - http://surfmypictures.com/image/25f3ad89acc11acd/a9r9t.html Comment | View 1 comment(s) Former UK Prime Minister Sir John Major Success - October 18th, 2016

Sir John Major is a British politician who was the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom and Leader of the UK Conservative Party from 1990 to 1997. He served as Foreign Secretary and then Chancellor of the Exchequer in the Government of Margaret Thatcher from 1989 to 1990, and was the Member of Parliament for Huntingdon from 1979 to 2001. He signed the photo I sent him and returned it in my SASE along with a letter from his assistant in 109 days. The Rt. Hon. Sir John Major PO Box 38506 London SW1P 1ZW United Kingdom Address and photo on my blog -> Comment | View 1 comment(s) John Major Success! - June 23rd, 2015

Address: P.O. Box 38506 London SW1P 1ZW Sent: May 2015 Received: June 2015 Sadly, I do not have envelope. Admin, don't put in other sections please! Link to photo - https://scontent-lhr3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hp ... 3491_o.jpg Comment | View 1 comment(s)
